channel.title: New skill?
channel.description:
was wondering how to add a new skill?
im going to make a skill where u use a item on a object it gives you a item then you have to go use that item on a object.

item.title: New skill?
item.dc:creator: @Tobbo88 Tobbo88
item.description:
@Tobbo88 wrote:

Implanted it in the end and my users love it

Read full topic

item.title: New skill?
item.dc:creator: @TannerRSC TannerRSC
item.description:
@TannerRSC wrote:

[quote=“Tobbo88, post:4, topic:463354”]Sorry example being… Name still to be made… but how it goes is follows…

Keep in mind im running a pk server so its kind of a minigame…

You have to have 5 items on you robes scythe mask and cape all cost 100k ea from a shop… so if you die in wild you loose 200k if u dont protect item and 100k if you do.

you go upto a corpse (several main pking spots in the wild) and when you use the scythe on it when you use it you get a soul from it and a message is sent to the whole server saying “playername just claimed a soul at location” they then have to go to the graveyard and use the item on something there and it frees the soul they get exp in the new skill.

Just a random idea i came up with lol and all the items needed are already in the game.[/quote]

^This is really nice^

Read full topic

item.title: New skill?
item.dc:creator: @Tobbo88 Tobbo88
item.description:
@Tobbo88 wrote:

Sorry example being… Name still to be made… but how it goes is follows…

Keep in mind im running a pk server so its kind of a minigame…

You have to have 5 items on you robes scythe mask and cape all cost 100k ea from a shop… so if you die in wild you loose 200k if u dont protect item and 100k if you do.

you go upto a corpse (several main pking spots in the wild) and when you use the scythe on it when you use it you get a soul from it and a message is sent to the whole server saying “playername just claimed a soul at location” they then have to go to the graveyard and use the item on something there and it frees the soul they get exp in the new skill.

Just a random idea i came up with lol and all the items needed are already in the game.
